Class javachart.chart.AreaChart

Class javachart.chart.AreaChart 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Chart
           |
           +----javachart.chart.AreaChart
public class AreaChart
extends Chart
Creates and draws a conventional area chart, stacking y values at each observation. An AreaChart contains 1 Area component, 1 LabelAxis for x values, and 1 StackAxis for y values. Because data values must be "aligned" to be stacked rationally, X values are assumed to be monotonically increasing whole numbers. You can, however, use the AreaChart's LabelAxis to create whatever labels are appropriate for your AreaChart.
See Also:
Area, LabelAxis, StackAxis, Chart

constructs a default chart

constructs a default chart with the specified name
